notes: Section 7 requires Software Update Management System (SUMS) with documented policies
Section 7.1.2 requires defined organizational processes for software update management
Section 7 SUMS covers software update lifecycle including OTA updates
Section 7 implies supplier management for software components affecting vehicle type

control_name: Legal, statutory, regulatory and contractual requirements
notes: Section 1 scope, Section 5 type approval requirements for software updates
Section 7.1.3 requires documentation of software update processes including failures
Section 7 SUMS addresses security-relevant software updates and patches
Section 7.1.2 requires RXSWIN (Rx Software Identification Number) for version tracking
Section 7 requires documentation and traceability of software updates
Section 7.2 requires integrity verification of software updates using cryptographic mechanisms
Section 7 integrates SUMS into vehicle development and maintenance lifecycle

control_name: Security testing in development and acceptance
notes: Section 7.2 requires testing and validation before software updates are released
Section 7 SUMS manages software changes, Section 8 covers vehicle type modifications
